mapper.insert: insert into oc_report (reportno, reporter, dno, content) values (oc_report_seq.nextval, #{reporter}, #{dno}, #{content})
mapper.select: select oc_report.dno, oc_document.writer, oc_document.content, tag, writedate, image, goodcnt, user_image, oc_report.content report_content from oc_document, oc_user, oc_report where oc_document.dno = oc_report.dno AND oc_user.user_id = oc_document.writer
